abstract: An explosive inferno from a cargo train derailment early Friday morning prompted the evacuation of a town in central Illinois.
snippet: An explosive inferno from a cargo train derailment early Friday morning prompted the evacuation of a town in central Illinois.
lead_paragraph: An explosion and fire after a cargo train derailed in central Illinois early Friday led to the evacuation of a town in central Illinois. There were no reports of injuries.

headline.main: Illinois Town Evacuated After Fiery Train Accident
